Entries.75160381/n MythFlowerLetter: WizardSong/8 7/farmer 8 12 0 Belinda -100 -100 2/skippable/pause 500/move farmer 0 -2 0/pause 1000/faceDirection farmer 1/pause 700/faceDirection farmer 3/pause 700/emote farmer 8/pause 500/showFrame Belinda 16/playSound wand/glow 255 0 0/warp Belinda 8 7/pause 1000/faceDirection farmer 0/emote farmer 16/showFrame Belinda 0/pause 400/speak Belinda "Greetings, farmer. You've done well to come here after reading my letter. You are truly one of my most loyal followers.$1#$b#The Foxbloom you procured was most excellent in quality. My beloved was quite overjoyed with the flower I-- you found for her.$1#$b#She used the energy the flower imbued her with to create two symbols of our love for us, and I thought it was only fair for you to have access to them as well.#$b#It may be a bit... intimate, but consider it a token of my gratitude.$1#$b#...And an, *ahem*, incentive to say not a word about the origins of that flower to my beloved.$5#$b#Now, come this way."/move Belinda 0 -1 0/move Belinda 1 0 1/move farmer 2 0 1/move farmer 0 -3 0/speak Belinda "My loyal follower Jio told you about this ledger, correct? You can use it to obtain goods you may need in your service of the Lady.#$b#I've added the rings my beloved designed to the listings.#$b#While she may be able to create them with her natural power, I need Spiritual Essence in order to manifest these items for you.#$b#That said, as long as you bring the amount of Essence required to the spell book, I will be able to create the ring for you instantly, across time and space."/pause 200/emote farmer 8/pause 200/speak Belinda "What do these rings do? That, my loyal follower, you must find out for yourself.$1#$b#I believe my explanation should suffice. So long."/pause 200/showFrame Belinda 18/pause 400/playSound wand/glow 255 0 0/warp Belinda -100 -100/pause 100/faceDirection farmer 2/emote farmer 16/pause 1000/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/end

Entries.75160382/n LinkedFishesLetter: nightTime/-1000 -1000/farmer 74 32 3 Belinda -100 -100 1/skippable/pause 1000/fade/viewport 64 32/move farmer -5 0 3/pause 1500/emote farmer 8/pause 500/showFrame Belinda 16/playSound wand/glow 255 0 0/warp Belinda 64 32/pause 1000/emote farmer 16/showFrame Belinda 4/pause 400/speak Belinda "Greetings, farmer. Thank you for meeting me here.#$b#Come, let us not waste any more time. What I have to show you will undoubtedly amaze you.$1"/move Belinda 4 0 1/showFrame Belinda 18/pause 400/playSound wand/glow 255 0 0/viewport -1000 -1000/glow 255 0 0 true/warp Belinda 22 53/warp farmer 23 53/showFrame Belinda 16/faceDirection farmer 2/viewport 20 50/stopGlowing/pause 200/emote farmer 16/pause 800/showFrame Belinda 0/pause 300/faceDirection Belinda 1/speak Belinda "Here we are! Notice anything different down here?$1"/emote farmer 28/pause 300/speak Belinda "Oh, right. I forgot teleporting can be a bit disorienting for humans...$2#$b#But you should be quite proud of yourself! You're still standing, after all. That's quite the accomplishment.$1#$b#Now come, come! There's much to see.$1"/move Belinda 0 5 2/warp Belinda -100 -100/pause 500/emote farmer 12/pause 500/move farmer 0 4 2 true/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/stopMusic/halt/warp farmer -100 -100/changeToTemporaryMap Custom_Ridgeside_RidgePond/viewport -1000 -1000/warp Belinda 12 13/faceDirection Belinda 3/warp farmer 20 9/fade/viewport 14 11/playMusic woodsTheme/move farmer 0 5 3/move farmer -7 0 3/pause 1000/emote farmer 40/pause 400/speak Belinda "A wonder for the eye to behold, is it not?$1#$b#My beloved and I created this pool together by combining our power, as well as our love.$4"/emote farmer 8/pause 200/speak Belinda "What is it, you ask? A natural question.#$b#Those fish you provided to me do indeed possess magical properties. As I suspected, they are connected to the very core of Ridgeside and its inhabitants.#$b#I believe that there is much more I can learn from them yet, so I have decided to make a sanctuary for them here.#$b#By tapping into the spiritual connection of Ridge Falls, these fish will be able to survive year-round.$1"/faceDirection Belinda 2/speak Belinda "Now, farmer, I know you humans like to consume the flesh of aquatic creatures, so I will kindly allow to you to fish from this pond. But be warned...$3#$b#Should the population dwindle too severely, you will most certainly face the consequences for it.$5"/pause 300/speak Belinda "That is all. Good day to you, farmer.$1"/showFrame Belinda 18/pause 400/playSound wand/glow 255 0 0/warp Belinda -100 -100/pause 1000/faceDirection farmer 2/emote farmer 28/pause 1000/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/end position 22 53

Entries.75160376/n MaiveSOLetter: SettlingIn/25 8/farmer 20 10 1 Maive 26 5 2/skippable/animate Maive false true 100 20 20 20 20 21 21 21 21 20 20 20 21 21 20 20 20 20 20 21 20 20 21 20 21 21 21 21 20 20/pause 500/move farmer 3 0 0/move farmer 0 -4 1/pause 800/stopAnimation Maive/faceDirection Maive 2/speak Maive "Ah, @. I see you received my letter. Good, good."/pause 200/faceDirection Maive 3/pause 100/playSound mouseClick/pause 300/move Maive 0 1 3/speak Maive "I'm sure you're wondering what I have to show you. Well, as I mentioned in my letter, I was very impressed with the dedication you put into helping my charity.#$b#It's clear that you care about our community and are invested in making it a better place, not just for yourself, but for the other townsfolk, as well.#$b#So, I'd like to return the favor and invest in you a bit.$1"/faceDirection Maive 0/pause 300/speak Maive "This phone has a direct line to my most trusted bank.#$b#I've put in a good word for you, and they're willing to give you a loan of 500,000 G, should you need it.#$b#You can pay it back whenever you'd like. The only requirement is that you pay it back in one lump sum, rather than in parts.#$b#Until then, they will deduct ten percent of the profit of your shipped goods as interest."/faceDirection Maive 3/speak Maive "I hope you know that they don't give such a lenient deal to just anyone.#$b#Truthfully, I'm putting my reputation on the line a bit by securing this for you, but I trust that you'll use the money to help develop our valley,#$b#either directly by putting the money towards public projects, or indirectly by helping your own farming business grow.#$b#Well, that's it, really.#$b#Remember that this phone is your direct line to the bank, so if you'd like to take out a loan or pay off your balance, you should come here."/faceDirection Maive 2/pause 300/speak Maive "I hope the two of us can effect some real change here... Yoba knows those two siblings can't.$5#"/faceDirection Maive 3/speak Maive "Now if you'll excuse me, I need to make a call."/move Maive 0 -1 3/pause 200/playSound mouseClick/pause 100/animate Maive false true 100 20 20 20 20 21 21 21 21 20 20 20 21 21 20 20 20 20 20 21 20 20 21 20 21 21 21 21 20 20/pause 1000/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/end

I'll show you my collection.$h"/emote farmer 32/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/warp farmer 53 23/warp Louie 52 23/faceDirection farmer 0/faceDirection Louie 0/fade/viewport 53 22/pause 1000/emote Louie 32/speak Louie "Ah, isn't my collection lovely?$h#$b#Sonny has taught me quite well about gardening.#$b#I expect nothing less from Amethyne staff!$h"/emote farmer 32/faceDirection farmer 3/move Louie -2 0 1/emote farmer 8/speak Louie "Don't you dare laugh at me, farmer.$a#$b#I'm about to reveal something unique, so you better cherish this moment.$a"/emote farmer 8/faceDirection Louie 3/emote Louie 28/speak Louie "I name some of my potted plants.#$b#This here is Trina.$h"/emote farmer 16/move Louie 0 -1 3/speak Louie "And this here is Keekee.$h"/emote farmer 40/faceDirection Louie 1/speak Louie "And these two here are Vinnie and Jaja."/move Louie 0 1 1/move Louie 2 0 0/speak Louie "And this lonely one is called Yama.#$b#This is a Touch-Me-Not plant imported from a faraway tropical country.#$b#It's locally known as 'Makahiya'.$h"/faceDirection farmer 0/emote farmer 32/pause 2000/faceDirection Louie 1/emote Louie 40/faceDirection farmer 3/emote farmer 8/speak Louie "Hey, farmer.#$b#Don't you dare tell anyone about this bizarre plant-naming of mine!$a#$b#I only told you this well umm...$s#$b#Umm-yes! It's you're reward for being my servant for the day!$4"/emote farmer 28/faceDirection Louie 0/pause 800/faceDirection farmer 0/emote Louie 28/speak Louie "Well umm...$s#$b#Let's head over to my room next.#$b#You need to assist me with a video game level I've been wanting to explore.$4"/emote farmer 32/pause 800/end dialogue "I'm sure being my servant was the highlight of your day! Right, farmer?$h"

Entries.75160338/f Maive 1000/e 75160337/H: distantBanjo/42 30/farmer 36 34 1 Maive 42 29 2 Zayne 42 31 0 Ariah 44 30 3 Louie 44 31 3 Sonny 46 29 3 Irene 46 30 3/skippable/textAboveHead Maive "Splendid as always."/move farmer 3 0 1/emote farmer 8/speak Maive "I'm quite satisfied with the outcome of the latest council meeting regarding our stocks at the Zuzu Airport.#$b#And I'm impressed with your recent achievements in the political and business world.#$b#You uphold the Amethyne excellency as always, Zayne. And I'm quite proud of you.$h"/speak Zayne "It's my pleasure, Grandmother."/speak Louie "Zayne! Zayne!$h#$b#Take me with you in your travels, brother!$h"/faceDirection Zayne 1/emote Zayne 32/speak Zayne "You know I'd love to, Louie!$h#$b#But well...$s"/emote Maive 40/speak Maive "Nonsense, Louie.#$b#You hardly reached 90 percent in your recent exams.$a#$b#We don't settle for less, and most definitely don't reward subpar performance.$a#$b#So, you are to stay.#$b#In order to not cause any trouble to your brother, and rectify your shortcomings.$a"/emote Louie 28 true/emote Zayne 28/speak Louie "I-I... I apologize, Grandmother.$s"/speak Zayne "I'm sorry, Louie...$s#$b#Maybe next time, okay?"/emote Louie 40/faceDirection Zayne 0/emote Maive 8/speak Maive "Hmm? A visitor?#$b#Ah, why isn't the farmer."/emote Zayne 8 true/move farmer 2 0 0/emote farmer 32 true/faceDirection Zayne 2/speak Zayne "Oh, greetings.$h"/speak Maive "Come closer, farmer."/move Zayne 1 0 3/move farmer 0 -3 3/move farmer -1 0 1/speak Maive "Zayne, I'd like you to meet @, the current owner of %farm.#$b#And, @. This is Zayne, my grandson and future head of the Amethyne family."/emote farmer 32 true/emote Zayne 32 true/move Zayne -1 0 3/message "Zayne shook your hand firmly."/speak Zayne "It's a pleasure to meet you, @.$h#$b#And my oh my, with hands as warm and strong, yet gentle, I feel like you're someone dependable.#$b#I'm sure %farm is in capable and good hands.$h"/pause 600/move Zayne 1 0 3/emote Maive 40/speak Maive "Now Zayne, what brings you here back to the village besides your report?#$b#Do you have any business here in the valley?"/faceDirection Zayne 0/emote Zayne 56/speak Zayne "Well, I simply came to see you and the family, Grandmother.$h#$b#Other than that, I do have business in a neighboring city.#$b#But it never hurts to visit once in while, as I do feel homesick sometimes.$h#$b#I hope you don't mind."/emote Maive 32/speak Maive "Ah, that's marvelous to hear, Zayne.#$b#Just make sure you're not being too lax."/speak Zayne "Ofcourse, Grandmother."/emote Ariah 32/speak Ariah "It's good to see you doing well, cousin.$h"/faceDirection Zayne 1/speak Zayne "Ariah, little cousin! I missed our princess!$h#$b#It's a pleasure to see you as well, Sonny!$h#$b#And Irene, lovely as always.$h"/emote Sonny 32 true/emote Irene 20/speak Sonny "Welcome back, Master Zayne."/speak Irene "We-welcome back, Mister Zayne.$l"/speak Maive "*Ehem* Zayne, I'm sure you're tired from your travels.#$b#Let Sonny help you with your luggage."/faceDirection Zayne 0/speak Zayne "Thank you, Grandmother."/faceDirection Zayne 1/emote Zayne 32/speak Zayne "Well, it was nice meeting you, @.$h#$b#I'm sure I'll be seeing again in my future visits.#$b#Though, I don't have a set schedule of my free time, so I guess I'll be seeing you when I see you.$h#$b#I wish you well!$h"/emote farmer 32/end dialogue Maive "Zayne has left to accomodate a family business partner in the area, as I assume you were looking for him?"

Don't worry, it's on the house.$h"/faceDirection farmer 3/emote farmer 32/pause 800/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/changeLocation Custom_Ridgeside_FayeHouse/warp Pika -100 -100/warp Corine -100 -100/warp Faye 4 15/faceDirection Faye 3/warp farmer 7 16/fade/viewport 5 15/move farmer -3 0 2/emote Faye 8/addObject 4 17 226/playSound pickUpItem/faceDirection Faye 2/emote Faye 16 true/move farmer 1 0 3/jump Faye/move Faye 0 1 2/speak Faye "Oh my Yoba! @! Hola, @!$h"/faceDirection farmer 0/emote farmer 32/speak Carmen "You saw all that, huh?#$b#How are you?$h"/move Carmen 0 2 2/emote farmer 32 true/move farmer 0 -1 0/pause 500/emote Carmen 56/speak Carmen "You saw all those other little kiddies, right?#$b#They have energy for days!$h#$b#Sometimes I even think that my mija doesn't realize she's a woman now.$h"/faceDirection Carmen 3/pause 1000/speak Carmen "But you know?#$b#I think it's me who's not ready to accept that.#$b#They grow up so fast.$h#$b#It feels like just yesterday when my mija was just a little baby.#$b#And I raised that little baby all on my own because her deadbeat father rarely visits her!$a#$b#But I'm happy she's turning out well.#$b#Well... Entries.75160329/f Kimpoi 500/w sunny/c 1/t 610: SettlingIn/20 109/farmer 20 112 0 Kimpoi 18 109 3/skippable/pause 600/move farmer 0 -1 0/emote Kimpoi 32/move Kimpoi 4 0 1/emote Kimpoi 40/speak Kimpoi "I think this one's doing well."/emote Kimpoi 56/move farmer 0 -2 1/emote farmer 32/emote Kimpoi 8/faceDirection Kimpoi 3/emote Kimpoi 32/speak Kimpoi "@, good to see you.$h#$b#Visiting the village today?"/emote farmer 32/speak Kimpoi "Well, it's good to see that you seem adjusted to the valley.#$b#My wife seems to be as well.$h#$b#But I don't think I can say the same for myself, you see.$s"/emote farmer 8/emote Kimpoi 28/speak Kimpoi "Er-well.$s#$b#I think I forgot to talk to people around here.$s#$b#My wife and I have been away for so long, that I don't quite know how to start conversations with old acquaintances anymore.$s#$b#I wasn't really much of social butterfly then, and I think it still applies today.$s"/emote farmer 28/speak Kimpoi "$q 7516329 null "#What do you think?#$r 7516329 10 kimpoi2_choice1#You're chatting with me just fine!#$r 7516329 0 kimpoi2_choice2#I think you just need practice.#$r 7516329 -10 kimpoi2_choice3#You are quite weird."/fork KimpoiSad/emote Kimpoi 32/speak Kimpoi "Thank you for the small talk, @.#$b#Oh, and here's something that I hope can help you.#$b#It's just extra fertilizer we had stored that I don't I can use today.[805] $h"/emote farmer 32/message "You receved Tree Fertilizer!"/end
Entries.KimpoiSad: stopMusic/emote Kimpoi 28/speak Kimpoi "But if I do seem that way, then I'd have to reflect on that.$s"/faceDirection Kimpoi 1/pause 800/emote Kimpoi 40/end
Entries.75160337/f Maive 500/w sunny/t 700 1600: SettlingIn/114 52/farmer 118 53 3 Maive 114 52 3 Lenny 113 51 2 Shanice 112 52 1 Sonny 115 51 3/skippable/emote Lenny 40 true/pause 600/textAboveHead Shanice "Hmm..."/move farmer -3 0 3/emote farmer 8/emote Maive 40/speak Maive "..and so I'll be contacting Zayne regarding the issue with the G. Corporation.#$b#Don't worry, Shanice. They don't have any valid claim on the old school you used to teach on back on Zuzu."/speak Shanice "Thank you, Madame.$s#$b#That sketchy corporation has been nabbing buildings recently and it had me worried.$s"/speak Maive "And Lenny, my company's representative has secured contact with Joja.#$b#You must've received their proposal of building a branch here. We will be discussing that soon.#$b#For now, don't worry about needing to cut down trees in the west side of the mountain. We have time to convince them for a more eco-friendly approach."/speak Lenny "Phew!$s#$b#I almost asked Lewlew for help with this one!$s#$b#I'm not even sure how he'd handle these! I know the local store owners here might start to hate me if I sided with Joja!$s"/emote Maive 12/speak Maive "Lenny! Why must you think of what others feel about you first?$a#$b#Keep in mind, I'm not helping you prevent Joja, I'm simply here for the best interest of this valley!$a#$b#You best start to think more of being a leader rather than a crowd pleaser.$a"/emote Lenny 28 true/emote Shanice 28/speak Lenny "Ouch!$s#$b#But yeah, I get your point, Maive.#$b#Don't worry! I'll be doing my best!$h"/emote Maive 28/speak Maive "I'm not even sure if that reached you.$s#$b#And it's 'Madame Maive' for you!$a"/speak Lenny "Yeah yeah! Tomato toh-mah-to!$h"/showFrame Lenny 16/emote Maive 12/emote Maive 8/faceDirection Maive 2/pause 800/speak Maive "Ah, farmer.#$b#Just the person I needed to talk to."/emote farmer 8/faceDirection Maive 0/pause 800/speak Maive "Sonny, please accompany Lenny and Shanice back to their establishments.#$b#Give Shanice my grandson's contact information too so Zayne can discuss the matter more directly."/speak Sonny "Certainly, Madame."/faceDirection Lenny 2/emote Lenny 16 true/jump Lenny/speak Lenny "Oh! That handsome young ambassador's number?$4#$b#Can you give it to me as well, Sonny?$h"/speak Maive "No.$a"/emote Lenny 28/faceDirection Maive 2/advancedMove Lenny false -1 0 0 -4 1 0 0 -9 2 9/advancedMove Shanice false -4 0 0 -1 1 0/advancedMove Sonny false -4 0/pause 800/speak Maive "Walk with me, farmer."/advancedMove Maive false 0 19 -1 0/emote farmer 28 true/pause 800/move farmer 0 18 3 true/viewport move 0 2 9500/pause 1000/speak Maive "I understand that your late grandfather has entrusted %farm in your hands.#$b#It seems like such a task for a former desk worker who seems to have little to no prior experience in farming.#$b#I'll have you know, that I've been keeping an 'interested' eye on that valuable and fertile land that you now call home.#$b#I've had my hands off it due to legalities and respect to that rascal's wishes.$a#$b#But know this, I have high expectations from you with how you'll manage and use the farm.#$b#All I want is the best for this valley, and I'd hate to see useless assets in the valley lying around achieving nothing notable when it has so much potential.$a"/emote farmer 40/faceDirection Maive 1/speak Maive "My point is, I expect you to live up to this valley's expectations, farmer @.#$b#And...$s"/emote farmer 8/speak Maive "Don't let him and her down...$s"/globalfade/viewport -1000 -1000/pause 1000/message "The Madame looks sad."/pause 1000/end

Your brother was such a klutz before!$h"/speak Lewis "Lenny! Why'd you have to bring back such embarrassing memories?$a#$b#You always get like this when you're drunk!$a"/speak Olga "Good thing this big oaf saw you, Mayor Lewis.$h#$b#I remember your sister was just having blast laughing at you.$h"/speak Freddie "Ah! I remember that story!$h#$b#My wife and I recently moved into the valley, didn't we, dear?"/speak Lola "Why, yes!$h#$b#You were all such energetic kids before!$h"/speak Bert "Hey! Wasn't that big tree near the Pelican town fountain, Lenny?"/speak Lenny "Yeppers!$h#$b#I think you were there too, right Bert?#$b#I remember you were pushing your cousin Caroline in the swing in the playground?"/speak Lewis "Well that explains why Olga threw the frisbee too hard!$h#$b#She was distracted looking at Bert!$h"/emote Olga 60 true/emote Lewis 56 true/emote Carmen 56 true/pause 500/speak Olga "Hey, no! I wasn't!$h#$b#But yes, I was really appreciated this big oaf helping me out from my mistake."/emote Kimpoi 32 true/pause 500/speak Carmen "You were like everyone's big brother, Kimps!$h#$b#I remember that time when you bought me a new fishing rod when I broke my favorite one when we were kids!$h"/speak Bert "And that time you helped me out when I accidentally broke @'s grandpa's shovel!$h#$b#You gave me all your allowance! I was really surprised!"/speak Kimpoi "Uh shucks, you're all too kind.$h"/speak Lola "You were such a helpful young boy, Kimpoi.$h#$b#You helped us unpack when we first arrived here too.#$b#My husband and I were at a very fragile state at that time, and that little gesture made us feel welcome here.$h"/emote Freddie 56 true/emote Olga 32 true/pause 700/speak Lewis "Ah! That time when you pushed me to become Mayor when I was anxious about it too!$h#$b#You're a great friend, Kimpoi.$h"/emote Kimpoi 60 true/emote Lenny 56 true/pause 600/speak Kimpoi "You guys are *ehem* making me feel really embarassed!$h#$b#I didn't know I was too involved in your lives!$h#$b#I apologize if I stepped out of line before.$s"/emote Lenny 32/speak Lenny "Oh, stop being humble and take our compliments you dork!$h#$b#We're really happy you're back as wellL!$h#$b#Why haven't you talked to us too much until now?#$b#We thought you were avoiding us or something!$h"/emote Kimpoi 28/emote Lenny 8/faceDirection Lenny 2/speak Lenny "Oh! @! Hello!$h#$b#Come here! We were just holding a small celebration with Kimpoi's return!$h#$b#It's a bit late, I know. But better now than never, right?$h"/emote farmer 32/faceDirection Kimpoi 2/speak Kimpoi "Oh, hello, @.#$b#Come take a sit.$h"/move farmer 0 -2 0/faceDirection Lenny 1/faceDirection Kimpoi 0/speak Kimpoi "You guys didn't really need to do all this, you know.#$b#But I really appreciate it.$h"/speak Carmen "Ofcourse, amigo!$h"/speak Kimpoi "Funnily enough, I recently opened up to @ here that I was worried about reconnecting to you all again.$s#$b#I've been gone for so long and so sudden that I felt like I didn't know how to approach you guys.$s"/emote Lenny 32 true/emote Bert 56/speak Carmen "Kimpoi! We're just happy you're back!$h"/speak Lenny "You've helped us a lot when we were young, Kimps.#$b#So don't worry about anything! We have your back!$h"/speak Olga "You don't know how much our friends have helped the orchard when we were struggling in some days, big brother.$h#$b#I was at awe with how much people are willing to help our family because of your kindness!$h"/speak Lola "Not to mention how much Lenny here always pushed Alissa to do a concert in the village!#$b#You secretly wanted her to shine, didn't you, Lenny?$h"/speak Lenny "Oh psh! You know I'm doing it so the village gets more funds from tourists, right?$h"/speak Carmen "Dios mija! Stop with the lies, Lenny! We know that you didn't charge anyone in the last time you had Alissa perform in the town square!$h"/speak Lewis "This village is lucky to have rising star in your hands.$s"/emote Kimpoi 60/speak Kimpoi "I-I don't know what to say.$h#$b#Thank you, everyone.$h"/emote Lenny 56 true/emote Olga 32 true/pause 500/emote Freddie 32 true/pause 200/emote Lewis 56 true/pause 200/emote farmer 32/speak Lenny "Enough talk and let's chug!$h#$b#Drinks are on me!$h"/emote Lola 56 true/pause 100/emote Freddie 56 true/textAboveHead Bert "Yeehaw!"/pause 300/textAboveHead Carmen "Yay!"/pause 300/faceDirection Lenny 0/faceDirection Lewis 2/emote Lenny 32 true/pause 500/emote Lewis 8/speak Lenny "Pst, Little bro!#$b#I forgot my wallet, so pay for the drinks tonight, okay?$h#$b#I promise I'll pay you back later!$h"/speak Lewis "Why you!$a"/emote farmer 28/faceDirection Kimpoi 3/faceDirection farmer 1/speak Kimpoi "It seems like I don't need practice talking to them anymore?$h"/emote farmer 32/faceDirection farmer 0/faceDirection Kimpoi 0/end dialogue Kimpoi "I'm thankful for everyone's kindness. I had a good time!$h"

Entries.75160333/w sunny/H/c 3/f Lorenzo 250: continue/64 15/farmer 64 16 2 Lorenzo 64 18 0/broadcastEvent/pause 800/emote Lorenzo 32/speak Lorenzo "Ciao! Hello, @.$h"/emote farmer 32/faceDirection Lorenzo 2/pause 1000/faceDirection Lorenzo 3/pause 1000/faceDirection Lorenzo 1/pause 1000/faceDirection Lorenzo 2/emote Lorenzo 56/emote farmer 8/faceDirection Lorenzo 0/speak Lorenzo "Oh, sorry, @.#$b#I was just admiring this land.$h#$b#You know, when I was small, and my siblings were babies.#$b#Well, Anton was, but Kiarra wasn't born yet.$h#$b#Our Papa and Mama took me to visit this place and your grandfather.#$b#I guess they knew each other?"/emote farmer 16/emote Lorenzo 32/speak Lorenzo "I was quite surprised to know you were his grandchild too, @!$h#$b#But hey, all I know is, your grandfather helped my family when we were new to the valley.#$b#And today, I am here to return the kindness your family has given to mine.#$b#Here are some supplies that I hope can help you."/emote farmer 16/speak Lorenzo "Here's a good fertilizer Jeric recommended! [466]#$b#A meal because you might be hungry! [224]$h#$b#Some cash to spend.#$b#And the same lucky charm your grandfather gave my Papa and Mama when they met. He said it belonged to your grandmother. [{{spacechase0.JsonAssets/ObjectId:Old Lucky Foxtail Charm}}]"/message "You received Deluxe Speed-Gro!#You received 1000$!#You received spaghetti!#You received an Old Lucky Foxtail Charm!"/money 1000/emote farmer 16/emote Lorenzo 32/speak Lorenzo "Mi dispiace, I'm sorry it took a while for me to come tell you about our families and their history.#$b#Before you came, a lot of people wanted this land, you know? And if you ever need some supplies, visit our shop when you're in the village, okay?$h"/emote farmer 32/end

I might as well hire your granddaughter to teach her."/speak Richard "I'm a bit hurt that you doubt me and my hotel, Madame.$s"/speak Maive "It's better safe than sorry.#$b#I bid my farewell, Richard.$h"/emote Richard 28 true/advancedMove Maive false 0 1 -13 0 0 20/speak Richard "Alright, then."/faceDirection Richard 2/speak Richard "If you'll excuse me, @.$h"/emote farmre 32 true/advancedMove Richard false 0 -20/pause 600/faceDirection farmer 1/emote farmer 56/faceDirection Anton 3/speak Anton "Is she gone?$u"/emote farmer 32/emote Anton 56/speak Anton "Phew! Drama avoided.$h"/emote farmer 8 true/move Anton 1 0 2/textAboveHead Anton "*Yawn*"/showFrame Anton 19/message "Anton seems to avoiding eye contact."/speak Anton "Nah, it's nothing.$h#$b#Just some silly stuff. Here and there. This and that.#$b#Nothing much.#$b#Anyway, back to sleep!$h"/emote farmer 40/speak Anton "$q 7516302 null "#Anton is trying to sleep.#$r 7516302 0 anton4_choice1#(Leave him alone)#$r 7516302 0 anton4_choice2#Why are you hiding from the Madame?"/fork AntonSleep/pause 500/faceDirection Anton 3/pause 500/emote Anton 28/speak Anton "Well first of all I think she hates me.$h"/emote farmer 8/speak Anton "Yeah well... Long story short, I'm an architect. Well, I guess used to be?"/faceDirection Anton 2/emote Anton 56/speak Anton "Ah, yeah. Those days where I felt like I could take on the world.$h"/faceDirection Anton 3/speak Anton "I had a fiance too.#$b#Almost married! Yeah, all that fun stuff."/emote farmer 8/speak Anton "It all started when the Amethynes hired me. Apparently my brother's wife had recommended me to them, and I also needed the money for my wedding.#$b#See, they wanted this big vacation house in the Ruby Islands.#$b#I worked day and night, giving my all to this project, right? Of course the pressure was on! It's the renowned Amethynes!#$b#In my mind, I'm doing this to secure a huge pay and endorsement galore from that rich family.#$b#All to secure me and my fiance's future.#$b#This project was to be my masterpiece.$h"/faceDirection Anton 2/emote Anton 28/speak Anton "Well, let's just say things went sideways."/stopMusic/emote Anton 40/faceDirection Anton 3/speak Anton "I got careless.$s#$b#I was so excited with what I could earn from all this that I didn't plan things out properly.#$b#I didn't realize how the location site wasn't suitable for such a huge building.$s#$b#I kept wanting to please the Amethynes, not thinking about the basics.$s#$b#I was so over my head.$s"/emote Anton 40/speak Anton "The whole structure couldn't witstand a small earthquake.$s#$b#I could've been responsible if someone got hurt.$s#$b#I was done for.$s#$b#And to top it all off... My fiance, well ex-fiance, left me a few months prior...$s#$b#Ironically, I forgot about the pre-wedding preparations, plans, and all that stuff I was working my butt for.$s#$b#I got preoccupied by this so called 'masterpiece' for years that I kept postponing the wedding, blurting out excuses, and basically neglected the person who I was doing all this for...$s"/faceDirection Anton 2/emote Anton 40/showFrame Anton 19/pause 800/speak Anton "Well, yeah.$s#$b#After all that things went downhill.#$b#Lost my company, lost my partner, and lost my passion too, I guess.#$b#And I'm just avoiding the Amethynes as much as I can because... Well... It's kind of scary, I guess?$s#$b#Don't have any money to stay anywhere else so I moved back here with my siblings.$s#$b#It's a bummer though, because the head of the Amethynes herself resides here too.$s#$b#It's like the world hates me or something."/emote Anton 28/faceDirection Anton 3/speak Anton "Well, at least I have a roof over my head at the moment.#$b#I'll move out soon as I get the motivation again, maybe.#$b#For now, maybe I'll just... well... I don't know.$s"/faceDirection Anton 2/pause 600/showFrame Anton 19/textAboveHead Anton "*Yawn*"/speak Anton "I'll just get some shut-eye and ignore the world for now."/emote farmer 40/faceDirection farmer 2/emote Anton 40/speak Anton "Hey, @.#$b#Thanks for listening.$h"/faceDirection farmer 1/emote farmer 56/speak Anton "Don't worry about me.#$b#*Yawn* I'll figure stuff out eventually.$h"/pause 800/textAboveHead Anton "*Snore*"/pause 800/end dialogue Anton "Thanks for listening, @. I had a nice nap too.$h"
Entries.AntonSleep: faceDirection farmer 2/textAboveHead Anton "*Snore*"/pause 800/end dialogue Anton "That was a nice nap.$h"

What brings you here?#$b#Are you feeling alright?$6"/emote farmer 32/emote Paula 28 true/move Paula 2 0 1/speak Paula "I'm sorry for the mess.$6#$b#I haven't had the time to properly unpack my stuff.$h#$b#Since I was reassigned back home, I got a bit busy catching up with friends instead.$h"/emote farmer 32/faceDirection Paula 2/pause 600/faceDirection Paula 3/pause 600/faceDirection Paula 0/pause 600/faceDirection Paula 1/emote Paula 28/speak Paula "But now, I realize I really need to stop procrastinating and do something about all this, right?$6"/emote farmer 28/speak Paula "Alright then, I'll start now-$h"/playSound doorClose/speak Kiarra "Doc! We have a slight emergency!$s"/emote farmer 8 true/emote Paula 8 true/faceDirection farmer 1/speak Sean "Are you sure you're okay, Keahi?$u"/speak Trinnie "I don't think your arm is supposed to turn that way!$u"/speak Blair "That looks really painful!$s"/speak Ysabelle "I told you! My arm can turn this way-OUCH!$u"/emote Paula 28/speak Paula "It looks like duty calls.$6#$b#I'll have to postpone the unpacking then!$6"/faceDirection farmer 3/emote farmer 28/end dialogue Paula "Phew! Good thing it wasn't something to be worried about.#$b#Keahi just slightly dislocated his shoulder, I did a reduction, and I advised him to stay still for a couple of days.#$b#I hope he follows what I told him.$s"

Entries.75160353/f Sean 500/w sunny/t 1000 1600/: playful/20 18/farmer 20 26 0 Sean 20 17 2 Blair 19 18 1 Keahi 18 19 1 Trinnie 21 18 3 Jas 21 19 3 Vincent 20 20 0/skippable/animate Keahi true true 100 20 20 20 23 23 23 20 20 20 23 23 23 21 22 21 23/emote Sean 56 true/move farmer 0 -3 0/emote farmer 8/speak Trinnie "So you're a princess turned prince, Sean?$u"/speak Jas "I think that's one way to put it, Trinnie."/emote Sean 32/speak Sean "Yeah, I guess so!$h#$b#A handsome prince too, right?$h"/emote Blair 28/speak Blair "Your head's full of air again!$h"/emote Jas 8/speak Jas "You already know about this, Blair?"/emote Blair 32/speak Blair "Why of course!$h#$b#Sean told me about him being a girl-turned-boy before when we were fishing at the ridge!#$b#I love this airhead-hunk-of-a-best-friend no matter what!$h"/emote Sean 60/speak Sean "Hey come on, Blair!$l#$b#No fair! I don't know how to react to that!$h"/emote Blair 56 true/pause 800/emote Sean 28/speak Vincent "Sean! Question!#$b#How did you know?#$b#Was it weird at the start?"/emote Sean 32/speak Sean "I guess so?#$b#It's more like I felt that I was supposed to be someone else.#$b#You guys know what a cocoon is, right?"/speak Keahi "Oh! I know that!$h#$b#A cocoon is a bird, right!? A Cocoon bird!$h"/emote Jas 28 true/faceDirection Blair 2/faceDirection Vincent 3/emote Blair 28/speak Trinnie "No silly! I think you meant a Kookoo bird!$h#$b#A cocoon is a baby butterfly!$h"/faceDirection Blair 1/faceDirection Vincent 0/speak Sean "Yeah, something like that!#$b#So it felt like I was stuck in a cocoon all that time when I was still 'girl Sean'.#$b#Then, when I finally figured out that I was actually 'boy Sean', I felt so free! Like a cocoon turned butterfly!$h"/emote Trinnie 20 true/pause 500/textAboveHead Vincent "That's so cool!"/pause 800/emote Keahi 56 true/pause 400/textAboveHead Blair "That's wonderful!"/emote Jas 32 true/pause 800/emote Sean 32/move farmer 0 -1 0/emote Sean 16 true/faceDirection Jas 2/faceDirection Trinnie 2/faceDirection Vincent 2/faceDirection Blair 2/stopAnimation Keahi 0/faceDirection Keahi 2/speak Vincent "Heya, @!$h"/speak Blair "Oh! We were blocking the way!$u"/speak Jas "Hello, @.$h"/speak Keahi "Heya!!!$h"/speak Trinnie "Did you hear that, @?$h#$b#Sean here is a butterfly!$h"/speak Sean "And a majestic one at that!$h"/emote farmer 32/faceDirection Keahi 1/emote Keahi 16/speak Keahi "Hey! Now that we had our questions out of the way.#$b#Can we start playing 'Castles and Dragons' now?$h"/faceDirection Vincent 0/faceDirection Trinnie 3/faceDirection Jas 3/faceDirection Blair 1/speak Trinnie "Yay! Let's go!$h#$b#I'll be the queen!$h"/speak Jas "Sean and I will be the wizards!$h"/speak Blair "I'll be the knight!$h"/speak Keahi "And I'll be the dragon!$u"/speak Vincent "Hey! We have no princess!#$b#Can I act as the princess then?"/emote Sean 32/speak Sean "You can be whoever you want to be!$h"/textAboveHead Vincent "Yay!"/pause 500/emote Trinnie 20 true/pause 800/emote Blair 56/speak Keahi "Awesome!$h#$b#Now I'll kidnap the princess!$u#$b#ROAR!$h"/faceDirection Vincent 3/jump Vincent/emote Vincent 16 true/pause 300/emote Trinnie 12 true/pause 400/emote Jas 28 true/faceDirection Blair 2/pause 500/emote Blair 28 true/pause 500/emote Sean 28 true/emote farmer 28/pause 500/end

Entries.75160357/f Shanice 500/w sunny/z winter/: jaunty/15 27/farmer 22 27 3 Shanice 15 26 3 Flor 14 25 2 Keahi 14 28 0 Trinnie 15 28 0 Yuuma 16 28 0 Louie 13 27 1 Sonny 13 25 2/skippable/showFrame Flor 39/move farmer -3 0 3/emote Flor 40/speak Flor "You may start, Miss Shanice.$7#$b#Thank you once again for taking part in all this.$6#$b#I'm certain I'll be able to learn how to better improve my educational interactions with the children.$6"/emote Shanice 32/speak Shanice "It's a pleasure to be here, Flor.$h#$b#I'm just glad to experience being a teacher again, even just for today."/faceDirection Shanice 2/emote Shanice 56/speak Shanice "Well! Good morning to all of you.$h"/jump Keahi/emote Trinnie 32 true/pause 500/emote Louie 40/speak Keahi "Good morning, Store Lady!$u"/speak Trinnie "Good morning, Miss Store Lady Shanice!$h"/speak Louie "Just a somewhat-decent day I guess, Missus Legame.$4"/speak Yuuma "Good morning, Miss Legame.$h"/emote Shanice 56/speak Shanice "Oh, wow! I love the varying energies present here!#$b#I guess you all seem to know me already, but let me introduce myself again just to be sure.#$b#Hello everyone. My name is Missus Shanice Legame, but you can call me Miss Shanice.#$b#Some of you might know me as 'The Shop Lady', as Trinnie and Keahi have said.$h#$b#Yes, I do own the convenience Heaps store with my husband.#$b#But for today I'll be your teacher.$h#$b#I used to work as a teacher back in Zuzu city.#$b#I worked there for quite a while before resigning and moving to the valley after I married my husband.#$b#Your Miss Flor has asked me today to be your teacher as part of her personal study.#$b#I hope you welcome me with open arms and listen to me during our time.$h"/emote Trinnie 20 true/jump Keahi/pause 500/emote Yuuma 32 true/pause 500/emote Louie 32/speak Keahi "WHAT!? You were a teacher in the big city, Miss Shop lady!?$u"/faceDirection Yuuma 3/speak Yuuma "Keahi, it's 'Miss Shanice' not 'Miss Shop lady'!$a"/faceDirection Keahi 1/emote Keahi 28 true/pause 800/speak Louie "Can we get this over with?$s#$b#I'm only here because grandmother told-er I mean asked me to come.#$b#I have my personal tutor back home and I believe this is unnecessary.$4"/emote Sonny 16 true/faceDirection Trinnie 3/faceDirection Keahi 3/faceDirection Yuuma 3/emote Yuuma 40 true/pause 600/emote Keahi 16 true/pause 500/emote Trinnie 12/speak Sonny "Master Louie plea-$s"/faceDirection Shanice 3/speak Shanice "Why, my oh my don't we have an Amethyne here with us today!$h#$b#I remember being one of Zayne Amethyne's tutor."/emote Louie 16/speak Louie "Huh? Wait? One of Big brother's tutors?$u"/emote Shanice 32/speak Shanice "Why yes! And Zayne was such a lovely and well-behaved student.$h#$b#I always admired the Amethyne family's sense of class and respect to authority.#$b#I expect nothing less from you as well, Mister Amethyne.$h"/emote Sonny 56 true/pause 500/emote Louie 28/faceDirection Louie 0/speak Louie "Sonny! Is this true?$a"/speak Sonny "Why yes, Master Louie.$h#$b#The former teacher, Miss Legame, is one of Madame Maive's trusted educators who she hires as personal tutors to your family.#$b#That is why the Madame has ordered you to attend this class upon hearing about Miss Flor's research."/emote Louie 28/faceDirection Louie 1/speak Louie "Fine... I'll listen.$a"/faceDirection Shanice 2/faceDirection Keahi 0 true/faceDirection Trinnie 0 true/faceDirection Yuuma 0/jump Keahi/jump Trinnie/emote Yuuma 16 true/speak Trinnie "Woah! You're awesome, Miss Shop-I mean Miss Shanice!$h"/speak Keahi "I'm all pumped up to learn!$u"/speak Yuuma "We're ready to listen.$h"/speak Louie "I guess I'll give it a shot."/speak Flor "Interesting...$6"/emote Shanice 32/speak Shanice "Well then! Let's get started?$h"/textAboveHead Keahi "YEAH!"/emote Trinnie 32 true/emote Yuuma 32/speak Shanice "Today we'll learn a bit about botany, which is the study of trees!$h"/emote farmer 32/emote Shanice 8/faceDirection Shanice 1/speak Shanice "Why hello, @!$h#$b#Would you like to join us?$h"/emote farmer 56/faceDirection Yuuma 1 true/faceDirection Keahi 1/faceDirection Trinnie 1/speak Keahi "Yay! More classmates!$h"/speak Trinnie "Heya, @!$h"/speak Yuuma "Hi.$h"/speak Louie "Great... more people.$4"/globalfade/viewport -1000 -1000/pause 1000/message "Shanice seemed to be having fun being a teacher for a day.#The kids seemed to like her as well."/end
Entries.75160361/f Sonny 500/w sunny/t 610 1200: continue/18 11/farmer 18 16 0 Sonny 18 11 0/skippable/addObject 18 10 190/textAboveHead Sonny "Thank you for your blessings..."/move farmer 0 -2 0/emote farmer 8/pause 800/faceDirection Sonny 2/pause 800/emote Sonny 32/speak Sonny "Good morning, Mr. @.$h^Good morning, Ms. @.$h#$b#You're here to visit the Mountain Spirit's shrine too?"/pause 500/speak Sonny "$q 7516361 null "#What do I say?#$r 7516361 10 sonny2_choice1#Yes, I'm here to give thanks.#$r 7516361 0 sonny2_choice2#I don't really know much about it."/emote farmer 32/speak Sonny "Come close.$h"/move Sonny 1 0 0/move farmer 0 -3 0/move farmer -1 0 0/emote Sonny 56/speak Sonny "I guess you're wondering why I come here to bring an offering as often as I can.#$b#Believe or not, the Mountain Spirit once saved my life."/emote farmer 16 true/pause 500/faceDirection farmer 1/emote Sonny 32/faceDirection Sonny 3/speak Sonny "You see, I'm born into a family who's under oath to serve the Amethynes, if possible, when we come of age.#$b#When I was young, my father bought me here to meet the head of the Amethyne family during that time.#$b#I was such a curious boy. While my father was working, I took the chance to explore the mountains.#$b#I was roaming around the Ridge Forest during the night when some foul looking creatures came out from the shadows and started to chase after me.$s#$b#I was cornered, crying, and full of wounds.$s#$b#I thought I was done for...$s#$b#Before I passed out, I saw a glimpse of a fox tail covered in gold and velvet red fur jump in front of me!$h#$b#Then I saw a pair of beautiful green eyes looking back at me... Eyes that made me feel safe.#$b#Then the next thing I know, upon waking up, is that I'm in front of this statue here.#$b#And so, I believe this is the shrine of the Mountain Spirit."/faceDirection Sonny 0/emote Sonny 56/faceDirection farmer 0/speak Sonny "From that day on, I've devoted my life to honoring the Mountain Spirit, and loving nature, as it is what she looks after according to literature about her.$h#$b#I worked hard to become the Amethyne family's head butler in order to work in this specific village.#$b#So I can easily visit my saviour's shrine.$h"/emote farmer 32/pause 2000/move Sonny -1 0 3/faceDirection farmer 1/speak Sonny "I'll be going back to my duties now.$h#$b#It was lovely chatting with you.$h"/emote farmer 32/faceDirection farmer 2/move Sonny 0 9 2 true/pause 1000/end

I am but a nameless traveler, but you may refer to me as Jio."/emote farmer 32/emote Jio 40/move Jio 0 1 2/emote farmer 8/emote Jio 40 true/speak Jio "Interesting..."/emote farmer 8 true/move Jio 0 -1 2/showFrame Jio 18/emote Jio 40/speak Jio "Nothing.#$b#If you'll excuse me, I have to go."/showFrame Jio 23/playSound shadowpeep/pause 600/warp Jio -1000 -1000/emote farmer 16/move farmer 0 -1 0/pause 500/faceDirection farmer 3/pause 500/faceDirection farmer 1/pause 500/faceDirection farmer 0/pause 500/message "What was that about?"/end

Wait, let me take a closer look!$h"/faceDirection farmer 1/emote farmer 28/message "Carmen seems to be distracted to notice Jio."/warp Kiwi 92 12/move Kiwi 0 8 2/emote Kiwi 8 true/pause 600/faceDirection farmer 3/emote farmer 16 true/textAboveHead Carmen "Come here little fish!"/pause 800/faceDirection Kiwi 3/emote Jio 8 true/pause 800/textAboveHead Kiwi "Kiwi stab intruder?"/emote farmer 16 true/emote Jio 16 true/pause 500/textAboveHead Jio "No."/pause 1000/textAboveHead Kiwi "Kiwi do it anyway."/emote Jio 16 true/emote farmer 16 true/speed Kiwi 4/jump Kiwi/advancedMove Kiwi false 0 3 1 0 -1 0 1 1000/showFrame Jio 23/pause 500/faceDirection farmer 2/showFrame 94/warp Jio 94 23/pause 500/faceDirection Jio 3/emote Jio 12 true/jump Jio 1/move Jio -1 0 3/faceDirection farmer 2/emote farmer 28/emote Kiwi 12/emote Jio 28/textAboveHead Kiwi "Shee, fine."/emote Jio 56/emote farmer 28/emote Carmen 8/speak Carmen "Oh? Did you say something, @?"/emote farmer 16/faceDirection Carmen 3/jump Carmen/emote Carmen 16/faceDirection Jio 1/emote Jio 40/speak Carmen "Dios mijo! You startled me!$h#$b#You must be the mysterious man the kids keep telling me abou!$h"/speak Jio "I'm not certain of what you mean, but all I know is that you're trespassing in our property."/emote Carmen 28/speak Carmen "Ay! I'm really sorry, mister!$u#$b#I was actually looking for you to ask your permission first.$s#$b#Then I got distracted from looking at this lovely lake.$s"/emote Jio 40/speak Jio "No matter.#$b#I understand your intentions, fisherwoman.#$b#But I'm afraid this lake is off-limits, as it's private property.#$b#I hope you understand."/emote Carmen 28/speak Carmen "Ay! I'm really sorry again, mister.$s#$b#But I'm glad to know that and I promise you, I'll tell the kids not to bother you anymore and call you weird names.#$b#I'm Carmen by the way!$h"/speak Jio "I appreciate your understanding, Carmen.#$b#I'm Jio."/emote Carmen 56/speak Carmen "Ay! A cute name for a handsome fella like you!$h#$b#Where are you heading with that kiwi fruit though?#$b#Off to sell it, mijo?$h"/message "Carmen doesn't seem to see Kiwi."/emote Kiwi 16 true/emote Jio 32/faceDirection Jio 3/speak Jio "I might as well, Carmen.$h"/emote Kiwi 16 true/emote Jio 56 true/emote farmer 28/speak Carmen "It does look quite tasty!$h#$b#I'm willing to buy it from you right now if you'd like!$h"/emote Kiwi 16 true/jump Kiwi/speak Kiwi "Shoo! Kiwi's running away!$s"/speed Kiwi 4/advancedMove Kiwi false 0 1 -18 0/emote Carmen 16/speak Carmen "Jio! Your fruit's rolling away!$u"/faceDirection Jio 1/speak Jio "Don't worry about that.#$b#I'll go look for it later.$h"/emote farmer 28/end dialogue Carmen "That Jio person was nice, wasn't he?$h"

Now come with me outside so I can show you that thing I mentioned.$1"/globalFade/viewport -100 -100/changeLocation Custom_Ridgeside_RidgesideVillage/warp Carmen 66 76/positionOffset Carmen 0 30/warp farmer 65 76/faceDirection farmer 2/fade/viewport 66 78/move Carmen 0 2 2/pause 200/move farmer 0 2 1/pause 300/speak Carmen "You know, my ex-husband and I only moved here a few years before Blair was born, but fishing has been the family trade for many decades now.#$b#You fish, too, so you know how hard it can be to make a living off of.#$b#Money was already tight, and then my husband left, and now I had to care for my little mija all alone.$s"/faceDirection Carmen 3/speak Carmen "But! I'm not just any woman, you know. I'm a Rivera! So I got up, dusted myself off, and worked harder than ever to provide for the two of us.$1#$b#And after fishing in this village for so long, I learned where the biggest fish hide - and those big ones sell for some good money!$1#$b#I've only ever shared my trick with Blair, but you're a good nio - I think you deserve to know, too.$1^I've only ever shared my trick with Blair, but you're a good nia - I think you deseve to know, too.$1"/faceDirection Carmen 2/speak Carmen "So, here's what you do..."/emote Carmen 40/pause 300/emote farmer 40/pause 300/emote farmer 16/pause 1000/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/stopMusic/playSound achievement/message "You've learned the Rivera Family Secret! All Ridgeside Village fish will now sell for double the price."/end
